text: 11.19: Ro 4.17-21Abraham kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, “Aisak, ana rimgirga, ne fhura ki ne ma.” Abraham khueŋ khothɨgi, “Fhe Bakɨme rimgi gumgi, ana taagia mbe khavi ŋkasŋka ki.” Maaŋ muuŋgiap, ne guigi guarara, nza mba hɨgi bigeŋ, nza ne vhunama sɨv khaŋ suanga. Abrahaman kam rimgiap, mboga tɨga kegap, taagia khavgi fara muuŋgi.
